categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Yigan Lam was a human female and the Padawan learner to Hallan Krintu. She was present for Kaj Loomit's sabotage of a simulation chamber. She carried a green-bladed lightsaber.
Yigan Lam appears in Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying adventure Begun, The Clone Wars Have!, released in 2019.
